author: Andrew Blackman
title: The Smartest Ways to Use Email at Work
text:
Email has become so ingrained in our workday life that we rarely give it a second thought. Perhaps we should.
Researchers have been putting a laser focus on how we can be smarter about using email at work, and they have come up with surprising insightsâ€”from the best way to tame an overflowing inbox to the unintended consequences of punctuation choices.
